title: Absolute Radiance
summary: The light’s final form—dense patterns, scant footing, relentless pressure.
overview: Godhome’s ultimate trial of platforming and pattern reading: walls of blades, orbs, beams and a vertical climb to finish.
where: Godhome — Pantheon of Hallownest / Hall of Gods (Ascended Radiance).
notes: Route platforms first, damage second. Save a dash for diagonal beams; during the final climb, prioritize survival over hits.

title: Enraged Guardian
summary: A crystal worker unbound: more beams, less breathing room.
overview: A meaner rematch of Crystal Guardian with faster sweeps and tighter spaces.
where: Crystal Peak — returns to the chamber after the first fight (upper section).
notes: Use cover and short hops to weave through lasers; listen for charge cues and keep mid-height to adjust quickly.

title: Failed Champion
summary: A furious echo of the False Knight with faster, heavier blows.
overview: Dream rematch: far quicker slams, rocks and shockwaves punish greedy heals.
where: Forgotten Crossroads — Dream Nail the False Knight’s husk.
notes: Wait for the true impact before dashing; punish exposed head quickly and reposition for falling debris.

title: Grey Prince Zote
summary: A swollen dream of grandeur—chaotic leaps, shadows, and spikes.
overview: Bretta’s fever-dream boss with bombastic moves and crowding hazards.
notes: Clear space first; his long recoveries are safe punish windows. Expect escalating chaos with repeats.

title: Hornet Sentinel
summary: Advanced weave: tighter threads and chained thrusts, fewer openings.
overview: Second duel with Hornet—faster strings, traps and harsher stage control.
where: Kingdom’s Edge — arena near the approach to the Cast-Off Shell.
notes: Dash discipline is everything; bait throws, step through thread traps, punish after needle plants and long lunges.

title: Lost Kin
summary: A freed vessel attacking without pause amid pools of infection.
overview: Dream variant of Broken Vessel with denser infection blobs and faster chains.
where: Ancient Basin — Dream Nail the Broken Vessel’s husk.
notes: Keep the arena clear of infection balloons; short punishes after dives and crossing slashes.

title: Nightmare King Grimm
summary: The troupe’s master at his peak—constant fire and perfect teleports.
overview: Peak execution check: relentless bats, pillars, cloak slashes and precise teleports.
where: Dirtmouth — Grimm Troupe tent (after empowering the Grimmchild).
notes: Learn the fire-bat tempo and cloak dives; stay grounded for faster reactions and punish on landings.

title: Pure Vessel
summary: Absolute technique: cuts, parries, and explosions on an unforgiving rhythm.
overview: Godhome refinement of the Hollow Knight—clean patterns, no infection stalls, strict punish windows.
where: Godhome — Pantheon of the Knight / Hall of Gods.
notes: Minimal jumps, micro-dashes and precise spacing. Respect parry tells; burst only after clear recoveries.

title: Sisters of Battle
summary: Three mantises in unison—crossed patterns that demand sharp reads.
overview: Godhome trio upgrade to Mantis Lords: overlapping teleports, crosses and synchronized dives.
where: Godhome — Pantheon of the Artist / Hall of Gods.
notes: Hold centerline; track audio/teleports and read the crossing angles before committing to a punish.

title: Soul Tyrant
summary: The scholar reborn—two phases and surges of projectiles.
overview: Dream upgrade to Soul Master with tighter fake-outs and a faster second phase.
where: City of Tears — Soul Sanctum (Dream Nail at the boss arena).
notes: Don’t bite on the first slam; real impact comes after the feint. Keep moving during phase two’s mini-slams.

title: White Defender
summary: Honor renewed: refined jets and arcs in extended sequences.
overview: Dream rematch of Dung Defender with sharper arcs and longer strings.
where: Royal Waterways — Ogrim’s hidden den (Dream Nail).
notes: Jump/dash rhythm over arcs; heal after tunnels and long celebratory pauses.

title: Winged Nosk
summary: A winged mutation—gains height and crashes down unpredictably.
overview: Godhome-exclusive variant with aerial charges, swoops and corrupted spits.
where: Godhome — Hall of Gods / Pantheon appearances.
notes: Bait high swoops from mid-range; jump-dash through and punish on ground recoveries. Avoid walling yourself.
